basics.name: Brian Hoole
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a Science Security focus in the Department of Information at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2019.

work.summary: Assess and estimate repair costs of collisions to motor vehicles and sell repair contract to customer. Establish operational procedures, policies and technical support.

Assess and estimate repair costs of collisions to motor vehicles and sell repair contract to customer. Foster relationships with commercial clients, vendors and business parters. Achieved 74% increase in annual sales production raising company ranking from 13th to 2nd in the Hawaii with State Farm Insurance.

Attained 98% sale-to-goal ratio, building individual and business account relationships. Engagement in key technology solutions, training and lifestyle rightsizing. Analyzed performance metrics and implemented action lans to orchestrate team sales goals and floor schedules, while delivering improved productivity and revenue growth. Performed within the top 5% for store sales productivity and earned District Top Salesperson award.
